dialog_lines.line: That's it for actions! Well done.
Be warned! Your crew will get distracted if morale (the green bar above their head) drops to 0%
From 100%, crew will get distracted after 10 seconds with no assignment, 20 seconds while working. It's demoralizing to just stand around!
When distracted, crew will head over to certain cargo and start taking some for themselves, damaging it.
If there is no distracting cargo present, they will just wander around. I have reset the cargo so you can see the crew be distracted by it.
To stop them, simply get their attention! If you stop crew before they damage a full unit of cargo, it will be restored.
You will be unable to do anything until this crew member gets distracted.
